shortdesc.ph: Sets the allowlist for video stream subscription.
Sets the allowlist for video stream subscription.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeVideoAllowlistEx(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int setSubscribeVideoAllowlistEx(int[] uidList, RtcConnection connection);

section.p: You can call this method to specify the users whose video streams you want to subscribe to.

ul.li: You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by the , , or autoSubscribeAudio settings in .
Once the allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.
You can call this method before or after joining a channel.
The allowlist is not affected by , , or the autoSubscribeVideo setting in .
Once the allowlist is set, it remains effective even if you leave and rejoin the channel.
If a user is added to both the allowlist and blocklist, only the blocklist takes effect.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: This method applies to multi-channel scenarios.

plentry.pd: The list of user IDs whose video streams you want to subscribe to. To subscribe to a user's video stream, add their user ID to this list. To remove a user from the allowlist, call to update the list and include only the user IDs you still want to subscribe to.
The number of user IDs in the list.

The list of user IDs whose video streams you want to subscribe to.
To subscribe to a user's video stream, add the user's ID to this list.
To remove a user from the allowlist, call the method to update the list; that is, only include the user IDs you want to subscribe to in the new list.
